page.title: 10Wetley Rocks Old Tyme fair
page.content: Each year around the Wetley Rocks and Consall area there are spring and summer events. One such event is the olde tyme fayre at Wetley Rocks. This fayre has all kinds of different stalls like the tombola, cake and food stall. There is also a fancy dress competition for all ages which consists of dressing up in olde tyme clothes. All the money goes to certain charities in the area, like the local church. This fayre is in May and traditional maypole dancing by the local children is one of the main attractions. The parades and Troop dances come from outside the area. Wetley Rocks is quite a small village so nearly all the villagers come to this fayre as well as people from the Werrington area.
